article.title: Northrop to Develop Multi-Platform Radar Technology
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation, El Segundo, California, is being awarded a $51,284,530 cost-plus-incentive-fee contract for Multi-Platform Radar Technology Insertion Program radar system development and demonstration, ECP-025, radar modification for Global Hawk Block 40.Â Air Force Mobility Command, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity.
